casebody.data:
Wednesday, August 11, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

98-2445. Stickney v. State Farm Mut. Auto. Ins. Co.

Richland App. No. 98CA7. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Richland County.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that this cause be held for the decision in Supreme Court case Nos. 99-342, 99-348 and 99-618, Holcomb et ál., v. State Farm Ins. Cos., and 99-219, 99-222, 99-223 and 99-224, Karr et al. v. Borchardt et al.
